notes_main_articles.title: Cannabis in the United Arab Emirates

notes_text: In 2008, even the smallest amounts of the drug could lead to a mandatory 4-year prison sentence.
notes: In 2008, even the smallest amounts of the drug could lead to a mandatory 4-year prison sentence.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in the United Arab Emirates}} In 2008, even the smallest amounts of the drug could lead to a mandatory 4-year prison sentence.<ref>{{cite news |url = https://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/uk/7234786.stm |title = Tourists warned of UAE drug laws |publisher = [[BBC News]] |date = 8 February 2008 |access-date = 17 February 2011 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170420193949/http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/7234786.stm |archive-date=20 April 2017 |url-status=live}}</ref>{{Update inline|date=October 2023|reason=Laws changed in 2016 and again in 2022.}}
